source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a static shot of a bustling street corner in a Japanese tourist district, likely Arashiyama in Kyoto. The scene captures traditional-style buildings, various food stalls, and pedestrians, including two women in kimonos. The video is a still image, showing a frozen moment in time with no movement.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
